verbs.description: stx entertainment abandons hong kong ipo plans stx entertainment [V: has] dropped its plans to list its shares on the hong kong stock exchange six months after it filed a draft prospectus the company had sought to raise up to 500 million of new capital and achieve a market valuation of more than 3 billion the ipo plans were shaped by sponsors goldman sachs and jp morgan and filed on april 26 that filing lapsed thursday oct 25 the hong kong stock exchange now shows the filing as having robert simonds hony capital jp morgan hong kong stock exchange the foreigner tencent new york hollywood ceo robert simonds john zhao j p morgan stx entertainment asia goldman sachs new york hang seng china telecomms hong kong

stx entertainment abandons hong kong ipo plans stx entertainment has [V: dropped] [ARG1: its plans to list its shares on the hong kong stock exchange six months after it filed a draft prospectus the company had sought to raise up to 500 million of new capital and achieve a] market valuation of more than 3 billion the ipo plans were shaped by sponsors goldman sachs and jp morgan and filed on april 26 that filing lapsed thursday oct 25 the hong kong stock exchange now shows the filing as having robert simonds hony capital jp morgan hong kong stock exchange the foreigner tencent new york hollywood ceo robert simonds john zhao j p morgan stx entertainment asia goldman sachs new york hang seng china telecomms hong kong
